definition: Futian district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: My company is located in the heart of the Futian District of Shenzhen Commercial Street.
sentences.chinese: 我公司位於深圳繁華的福田區商業街。

sentences.english: Merlin streets in the Futian District, northern, central area known as the garden.
sentences.chinese: 梅林街道位於福田區的北面，有中心區後花園之稱。

sentences.english: This project including both east and west sides of Hua-Qiang road, Futian district, Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 項目範圍爲深圳福田區華強北路東西兩側。

definition: Nanshan district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong/Nanshan district of Hegang city 鶴崗|鹤岗[He4 gang3], Heilongjiang
Guangzhou subprovincial city and capital of Guangdong/Canton
Tianhe district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
(used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
Xiangzhou district of Zhuhai city 珠海市[Zhu1 hai3 shi4], Guangdong
Haizhu district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
Wan Chai district of Hong Kong
Yuexiu district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
Hong Kong Island/abbr. for 香港島|香港岛[Xiang1 gang3 dao3]
